sentences.sContent: The only means of communication was sign language.
sentences.sCn: 唯一的交流方法是手语。

sentences.sContent: The window was our only means of escape .
sentences.sCn: 跳窗是我们唯一的逃生方法。

sentences.sContent: Do you have any means of identification ?
sentences.sCn: 你有什么身份证明文件吗？

sentences.sContent: art as a means of expression
sentences.sCn: 作为一种表达方式的艺术

sentences.sContent: Homework should not be used as a means of controlling children.
sentences.sCn: 家庭作业不应该作为约束儿童的手段。

sentences.sContent: I had no means of telling him I would be late.
sentences.sCn: 我没有办法告诉他我会迟到。

sentences.sContent: Brian was prepared to use any means to get what he wanted.
sentences.sCn: 布赖恩准备不择手段地得到他想要的。

sentences.sContent: They had entered the country by unlawful means .
sentences.sCn: 他们通过非法途径进入了这个国家。
